meanings.definition: Includes or contains within its scope or range.
meanings.sent1: The zoo encompasses many different animals.
meanings.sent2: The map encompasses all the countries in the world.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket encompasses all our favorite snacks.
meanings.sent4: Her love for music encompasses her entire being.
meanings.sent5: The library encompasses a vast collection of books.

meanings.sent1: The garden fence encompasses the entire yard.
meanings.sent2: The fog encompasses the entire city in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The cozy blanket encompasses me in warmth.
meanings.sent4: The protective shield encompasses the spaceship.
meanings.sent5: The darkness encompasses the room, making it hard to see.
